Title: Je Souhaite
Plot: Mulder and Scully discover a genie in a rug who, after 500 years of granting wishes, has come to the conclusion that people are still as greedy and self-centered as they always have been, and she begins to corrupt the wishes she grants if they are not specific enough.
GuestStars: Brett Bell, Paula Sorge, Will Sasso, Kevin Weisman, Paul Hayes
